Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory604.jpg'}
{3: 'The battle has been going on for three hours, and individual Corrupted and Hetero-Creatures are still shambling toward Medical Center 09.'}
{3: 'The defenses are all damaged, the corpses of Corrupted filling every street and alley. The Punishing Virus concentration has gone from bad to worse.'}
{3: 'Adding fuel to the flame, the streets outside the medical center have cracked apart. Red Tide oozes out, obstructing the ways in and out.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier 1', 3: "Something's wrong. These things seem to know where they're going, unlike the barrage of Hetero-Creatures who attacked thoughtlessly.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier 2', 3: "How's the medical center doing?", 4: '2'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Lillian', 3: "Staying inside the center is still safe for now, but we've got a lot of injured. This is bad... The CPF's going to overload if the virus concentration remains this high.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lillian', 3: 'We should evacuate everyone ASAP, or at least call in reinforcements.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier 2', 3: "We can't evacuate. There's nowhere to go.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Construct Soldier 2', 3: "I just came back from a patrol. The roads are damaged and covered in Red Tide. They're not completely submerged yet, but our defenses won't hold up for long. The others won't stand a chance.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier 3', 3: "We're trapped?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier 1', 3: "Something is seriously wrong! This isn't random! Talbot, did you lure an Ascendant here?!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Talbot', 3: "That Ascendant only said he'd come for me. Why would he do something like this?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier 1', 3: "To destroy us, obviously! Did you think he'll deliver you a crown without hurting anyone else?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier 2', 3: "I'm sorry, Lillian, but we better kick him out!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lillian', 3: "But... he's heavily infected right now! Sending him out will kill him!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier 1', 3: 'Well, his Ascendant buddy can save him!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The young man defeats the last creature by the entrance before opening the door and going inside the medical center.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "I might be the one who's connected to the Ascendants.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'I just remembered some things. Before I lost my memories... I might have met the Ascendants.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier 1', 3: 'Excuse me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier 2', 3: "Hey, this guy is almost clean. He's been fighting with us all this time... his infection should be way worse than this.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier 3', 3: 'Maybe his Inver-Device was enhanced?', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Talbot', 3: 'Can you control the Corrupted?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noan', 3: "I don't know. I don't know how at the very least.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier 1', 3: 'Maybe a Transcendant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier 2', 3: "Can't be. His Punishing Virus concentration is way too low for that.", 4: '2'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Talbot', 3: "You aren't being serious, are you? That's wild. An amnesic Ascendant not realizing he is an Ascendant and got accepted by others... that's a plot straight out of a—", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Are you talking about the Cardman Rider who forgot he was a demonic scientist?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Talbot', 3: "Eh, no? It's the one with the guy who picked up the Death Journal. He also lost his memories.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "I can't believe you've read that...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Talbot', 3: "Wait a minute—didn't you lose your memories? How come you can remember the plots of those mangas?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier 3', 3: 'What on earth are you two yapping about?!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier 3', 3: 'Is he the Ascendant you met, Talbot?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Talbot', 3: "No. He was standing in the dark, and his silhouette looked like... a giant snake, I'd say?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Talbot', 3: 'What about you? Do you remember what your Ascendant looked like?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Not really, but I'm pretty sure mine wasn't a giant snake.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Talbot', 3: 'What did yours tell you?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: '...Mine wanted me to become one of them. I refused, and then I blacked out.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Talbot', 3: "That was more or less what I was told as well. I guess they aren't that strict on who they choose?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Blush', 3: 'Recruiting victims! Anyone will do! Fall into our trap!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Talbot', 3: 'Stop repeating what Anna said!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier 3', 3: "Let's just kick both of them out!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lillian', 3: "Stop! That won't solve anything! The Punishing Virus concentration is too high outside right now. We'll probably kill them if we send them away!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBianHong.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier 4', 3: "If they're the reason we're in this mess right now, why shouldn't we kick them out?!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier 4', 3: "Comms are down right now—we can't even call for backup! The way I see it, everyone remotely suspicious shouldn't be able to stay!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier 4', 3: "I know things are pressing right now, but that doesn't mean we should just take everyone in! We don't have enough medical supplies, to begin with!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier 5', 3: "We can't just kick them out! They're connected to the Ascendants! We've got to put them down!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Talbot', 3: "Do you think killing us will save you? If an Ascendant is after the medical center, you're still going to die unless there are enough people to protect this place!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier 2', 3: "It's all your fault!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The crowd begins to argue intensely. Watching the scene unfold, Noan can feel his non-existing heart aching.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBianHong.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory142.png', 2: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'He has been through something similar in his recovered memories.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The desperate folks who got involved with the wrong people.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The innocents who were branded "guilty" by association.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The powerlessness, birthed from years of oppression and fear...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory142.png'}
{1: '1', 3: "...was sharpened into a knife going for their kin's throats the moment it exploded."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory142.png'}
{1: '1', 3: "This tragedy will keep repeating itself as long as pain and suffering fill the people's livelihoods."}
{1: '1', 3: 'But something has changed. This time, Noan is not the powerless boy he once was.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory604.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory604.jpg'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: '...Let me make use of this "anomaly" before I "lose control."', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory604.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noan', 3: "I'll get you reinforcements.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier 2', 3: 'Excuse me?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "If comms are down and we're surrounded by the Red Tide, let me go out and find reinforcements.", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Talbot', 3: "But you aren't sure if you're an Ascendant. It could be a coincidence that you're immune! You won't make it alone if you're attacked by a lot of Corrupted or go somewhere with a much higher virus concentration!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Do or do not, there is no try, is there? Not to mention that I could possess powers I couldn't control—powers that could harm you all.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier 6', 3: "Why should we trust you?! What if you run away? Better we take you down now before you've recovered your full power!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "You can kill me, but everyone here will die as well if they're trapped by the Red Tide. Didn't Lillian say the CPF won't run for long?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Elder Refugee', 3: 'Let him go.', 4: '3'}
{3: 'An elderly refugee walks up. His step may be sluggish, but his presence is profound.'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier 2', 3: 'Why?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Elder Refugee', 3: "He wouldn't have mentioned the Ascendant if he wanted to run away.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier 6', 3: 'So? Maybe he was protecting Talbot!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Elder Refugee', 3: "Then Talbot can stay. He'll surely come back if he wants to protect Talbot.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier 6', 3: "That's... But...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Elder Refugee', 3: "I know we're all wary of enemies hiding in the dark, but this paranoia when we haven't even caught a glimpse of that Ascendant will only spell our defeat.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Elder Refugee', 3: "Talbot and this young man are just trying to help. They mean well, and they've yet to show any of the abilities you mentioned.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Elder Refugee', 3: 'There are only so few of us left... What remains if we hurt those that stand by us?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Elder Refugee', 3: "Let him go. That's the only way.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noan', 3: "Please trust me. Ascendant or not, I'll never use that power to do harm.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noan has planned for the worst—if he loses control, he will do anything to stop himself from hurting others, even at the cost of his life.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'I will come back with reinforcements.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier 6', 3: "You know what will happen, right? You're associated with the Ascendant. The Purifying Force will come for you when you come back.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Then let me do what I can to help you all before that happens.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He knows he might be out of time.'}
{3: "People hesitate in silence. Eventually, they nod at Noan, swayed by a tide they cannot cross and Noan's unyielding gaze."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier 1', 3: "...Alright, you're on. The other three will stay.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Noan nods back at the rest of them and turns to face Talbot. There is much he wants to say, but now is not the time.'}
{3: 'All Noan can do is smile and wave at Talbot, Lillian, and Lithos.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Wait for me.', 4: '1'}
